divs: sighting detailson 2\8\08 i was driving to work and approximately at 8:15 p.m., i saw two yellowish lights in the sky. shortly after that two more lights gloomed and aligned with the other two lights. all four lights remaind glowing for less that five seconds. the first thing that came to my mind was the incident that occurred in phoenix, az the lights were very similar to those. what made me lose sight of the lights was the big lake burm located in the area. first thing i did after the lights disappeared was call my wife and told her what i had seen hoping that someone else had seen lights and reported them too.
Summary: Four yellowish lights in the sky.
trends: There have been 21 other sightings in Laredo
There were no other sightings in Laredo on or around February 8th 2008
